title: Applied Patient Care Skills II
description: Based on the philosophy and processes of pharmaceutical care, this module aims to further develop students’ skills in patient-centered communication, critical evaluation and clinical reasoning essential in the entrustable professional activities identified by the Singapore Pharmacy Council for entry-to-practice pharmacists.
prerequisite: PR1151 Applied Patient Care Skills I
preclusion: Students admitted into the Pharm Sci major and Pharm Sci minor programmes.
